definitions.example: That store offers a variety of products.  We've got to sell a lot of product by the end of the month.

definitions.definition: Any preparation to be applied to the hair, skin, nails, etc.
definitions.example: Wash excess product out of your hair.

definitions.definition: Anything that is produced; a result.
definitions.example: The product of last month's quality standards committee is quite good, even though the process was flawed.

definitions.definition: Illegal drugs, especially cocaine, when viewed as a commodity.
definitions.example: I got some product here – you buying?
